title: Deadly snake found under seat on plane - and there's a twist in the tail
description: A pilot in South Africa made an emergency landing after finding a highly venomous cobra hiding under his seat.

title: Less than 3% world economic growth predicted due to geopolitical divisions and US bank failures - IMF chief
description: High interest rates, US bank failures and geopolitical divisions in Europe are reasons why the world economy is expected to grow less than 3% in 2023, the chief of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) has said.

title: Macron appeals to China's Xi to 'bring Russia back to its senses' over Ukraine invasion
description: French President Emmanuel Macron has appealed to Xi Jinping to "bring Russia back to its senses and bring everyone back to the negotiating table" over the Ukraine war.

title: One of Macron's favourite restaurants set on fire and dead rats thrown at city hall in French protests
description: Protests have broken out across France on the 11th day of national strikes with one of President Emmanuel Macron's favourite restaurants set on fire, tear gas used on demonstrators and traffic at Paris' main airport disrupted.

title: One of Macron's favourite restaurants set on fire and dead rats thrown at city hall in French protests
description: Protests have broken out across France on the 11th day of national strikes with one of President Emmanuel Macron's favourite restaurants set on fire, tear gas used on demonstrators and traffic at Paris' main airport disrupted.

title: Pilot wrongly handcuffed and detained after FBI and army break into hotel room
description: The FBI and the U.S. army captured an innocent Delta Airlines pilot - who was not the intended target - in a training exercise gone wrong in Boston.

title: Sex is a 'beautiful thing', Pope Francis says in documentary
description: Pope Francis praised the virtues of sex in a documentary released on Wednesday, calling it "one of the beautiful things that God has given to the human person."

title: How emergency alerts work in other countries - including a few times when it has gone wrong
description: The UK is getting its own emergency alert system to warn people of any immediate public safety risks.

title: Macron urges Xi Jinping 'to bring back Russia to reason'
description: Emmanuel Macron has told Chinese leader Xi Jinping that the war in Ukraine has hit stability and ended decades of peace in the country.

title: More coal power built around the world in spite of pollution, pledges and coal end-date
description: The world is still developing new coal power, in spite of it being the most polluting fossil fuel, of promises to phase down coal and despite agreements that all coal stations should close by 2040.

title: Former Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi reportedly diagnosed with leukaemia
description: Italy's former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi has been diagnosed with leukaemia after he was admitted to hospital, Reuters reports.

title: Police hunt pair who stole a platypus and took it onto a train
description: Police in Australia are on the hunt for two people who allegedly stole a platypus.

title: Murder probe under way after woman found dead in Ireland
description: A murder investigation is under way in Ireland after a young woman was found dead at a property in Limerick.
